proofDetails.en: Built this portfolio with Next.js, localization, and custom UI components.
proofDetails.ja: Next.js とカスタム UI で本ポートフォリオを構築し、多言語対応とアクセシビリティを実装しました。
proofDetails.zh: 使用 Next.js 和自定义 UI 构建此作品集站点，实现多语言和无障碍支持。

experienceEntry.summary: Designed and built a personalized engineering portfolio with localization, accessibility, telemetry-ready structure, and custom UI components.
highlights: Shipped en/ja/zh localization with shared content definitions to keep information consistent.
Built a custom component set with theme/contrast controls and accessibility guardrails.
Centered performance and observability with critical CSS, edge rendering, and structured data.
